changes.title: Unowned Cards
details: Introduced - Summary of unowned cards.
With "General": The ratio of cards and shards, as well as wildcards are missing.
With "Missing Cards": List of missing cards.
With "Deckcode": Deckcodes contain missing cards.

changes.title: Patch Note Generator

Now toggle is disabled if there are no cards in that category.
Now will sort by Card Type, Name and then Card Code.
The list will now be grouped by Card Type.

changes.title: Database
